metadata.title: CVE-2014-5515 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
ntopng: Several vulnerabilities fixed upstream in 1.2.1

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntopng - 1.2.1+dfsg1-1.1
ntopng-data - 1.2.1+dfsg1-1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ntopng package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1+dfsg1-1.1').
